name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Frontend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing responsive and engaging web applications using **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**. Skilled in creating intuitive user interfaces and seamless user experiences with a focus on **UI/UX** principles and leveraging tools like **Storybook**, **Radix UI**, and **Tailwind**. Proficient in building interactive visualizations using **WebGL**, **Three.js**, and **React Three Fiber**. Additionally, I possess strong backend capabilities with expertise in **Python**, ensuring efficient integration of **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs. My tech stack includes **Docker** for containerization, and I have utilized **Playwright**, **Vitest**, and **Cypress** for robust testing solutions. My background in AI/ML allows me to integrate cutting-edge technologies like **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, and **LangChain** into projects. I have a proven track record of contributing to successful projects at leading companies, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to develop interactive user interfaces and enhance user experience for diverse applications, impacting over **10,000** users.
Designed and implemented animations and visual elements using **WebGL**, **Three.js**, and **React Three Fiber**, resulting in a **30%** increase in user engagement.
Integrated backend services with **Node.js** and **Python** to support dynamic web applications while maintaining **99.9%** system uptime.
Conducted thorough UI/UX testing using **Playwright**, **Vitest**, and **Cypress** to ensure responsiveness and accessibility across various devices, achieving a customer satisfaction score of **95%**.
Collaborated with design teams utilizing **Figma** and **Framer** to develop aesthetically pleasing interfaces aligned with business goals.
Leveraged **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs for efficient data handling and management, reducing loading times by up to **40%**.
Implemented robust security measures using **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for authentication, ensuring protection against unauthorized access.
Contributed to code reviews and mentorship, fostering a culture of growth and best practices within the engineering team.

- Spearheaded the development of interactive user interfaces using **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, enhancing user experiences with measurable improvements in engagement by **25%**.
- Leveraged **WebGL** and **Three.js** to create stunning visualizations and animations, optimizing performance to achieve frame rates exceeding **60fps**.
- Designed and implemented reusable component libraries with **Storybook** and **Radix UI**, promoting consistency and reducing development time by **30%**.
- Integrated backend services with frontend applications using **REST** and **GraphQL**, ensuring efficient data retrieval and real-time updates via **WebSocket** connections.
- Collaborated on UI/UX design processes using tools like **Figma** and **Framer**, resulting in a user-centered approach that aligns with client expectations.
- Wrote automated tests utilizing **Playwright**, **Vitest**, and **Cypress**, ensuring code quality and reliability with a target of **90%** test coverage.
- Facilitated the implementation of AI-driven features using **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, and **LangChain** to enhance user functionality and engagement with advanced capabilities.
- Championed the migration of existing functionalities to modern frameworks, leading to a **15%** decrease in load times and improved performance metrics compared to legacy systems.
- Drove continuous improvement initiatives for the development workflow, adopting **Docker** for consistent development environments and enhancing deployment efficiency.

Utilized **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** to build interactive user interfaces, enhancing user experience across the platform with a focus on **UI/UX** principles.
Developed and integrated backend services with **Python** and **Flask**, including trade execution and portfolio management features to support a trading platform with over **1000** daily transactions.
Engineered responsive animation features using **Three.js** and **WebGL**, optimizing real-time visual components for a seamless interaction experience that reduced load times by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver real-time data through **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, upgrading server communication methods, which improved data retrieval speeds by **25%**.
Employed **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **Vitest** for comprehensive testing frameworks, increasing test coverage to **90%** and enhancing application reliability and performance during deployments.
Implemented visual design prototypes and mockups using **Figma** and **Framer**, ensuring alignment with client specifications and reducing iteration times during the design process by **20%**.
Managed containerized applications using **Docker**, facilitating smooth deployment processes and environment consistency across development and production stages.
